original_text: Many people heard what Jesus said. Even the men who took taxes from people agreed with his message. They had gone to John to baptize them. They all said, ‘What God says about us is right.’
korean_text: 모든 백성과 세리들은 이미 요한의 세례를 받은지라 이 말씀을 듣고 하나님을 의롭다 하되

sentences.original_text: Many people heard what Jesus said.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 예수님이 하신 말씀을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Even the men who took taxes from people
What God says about us is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리에 대해 말씀하신 것은 옳습니다.
